reviewtext: I have had these headphones for 7 years, and the headphones are great.  But more than that, KOSS is amazing.  If there is a short, a problem (and there have been about 4 over the years), they give you a lifetime warranty on the headphones, and have either fixed or replaced them for a nominal charge to cover shipping and handling.  I recommend any KOSS headphones not just because the sound is really good, but because they stand behind their product.
summary: A great product, and a lifetime investment
